caption.p: Arabidopsis fecundity and mortality tolerance to UK1-TuMV, JPN1-TuMV and LS-CMV. ( A) Values of fecundity tolerance to virus infection measured as the slope of the SW to virus accumulation linear regression. ( B) Values of mortality tolerance to virus infection measured as the slope of the LP to virus accumulation linear regression. Values are mean Â± standard error of 18 (All), 7 (Group 1) and 11 (Group 2) Arabidopsis accessions.
